meanings.sent1: My being is important to me.
meanings.sent2: The being of the universe is a mystery.
meanings.sent3: The being of a ghost is quite spooky.
meanings.sent4: The being of time is ever-flowing.
meanings.sent5: The being of a star is dazzling.

meanings.sent1: The being in the forest moved quietly.
meanings.sent2: Every being on Earth plays a role.
meanings.sent3: The being in the zoo looked curious.
meanings.sent4: The being in the ocean swam gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The being in the sky soared high.

meanings.definition: The nature or essence of a person or thing
meanings.sent2: The being of a tree is to grow.
meanings.sent3: The being of a clown is to make people laugh.
meanings.sent4: The being of a mountain is strength.
meanings.sent5: The being of a flower is beauty.
